title: FS: Tobacco Cards incl. HOFers ALL SOLD
author: jabiloxi

posts.post_title: FS: Tobacco Cards incl. HOFers ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206's that I need to sell to make room for some new additions:

1909 Piedmont Elmer Flick Cleveland HOF G-VG (150 subj/fact.25) $SOLD

1909 Piedmont Fred Clarke Pittsburg HOF fair (150 subj/fact.25) $30

1909 Piedmont Rube Marquard New York HOF G (350-460 subj/fact.25) $45

1909 Piedmont Roger Bresnahan St. Louis HOF VG (350 subj/fact.25) $56

1909 Piedmont John McGraw New York HOF PSA 1 (350-460 subj/fact.25) $33

Please email me if interested, first email that says "I'll take it" gets it.

All have been sold...I apologize for the delay it took me to get back to everybody, I haven't been able to use the computer for more than a couple minutes all day (new job).

Thanks.
